secret.description: This key has Secret access control enabled. In order to use it, add the secret below.
secret.label: Secret

directory.title: Select a file to verify
directory.error: An error occurred while loading the directory

try-out.subtitle: Download the demo documents to see how it works.
try-out.title: Try out with demo documents

home.subtitle-ensure-document: Ensure document availability across distributed systems
home.subtitle-verify-independently: Verify independently your files on blockchain
home.title: Verify your document's integrity and authenticity

tooltip.algorithm: The cryptographic algorithm utilized to generate a digital signature.
tooltip.anchor-id: Identifier of the BLOOCK state transition the document has been included in.
tooltip.link: Refers to the specific location where a file is allocated and is available for consumption
tooltip.networks: Networks where document fingerprint was recorded.
tooltip.public-key: Cryptographic key employed to produce a digital signature
tooltip.root: Digital fingerprint representing all records included in BLOOCK state since inception.
tooltip.signature: Cryptographic representation of the digital signature
tooltip.signatures: List of digital signatures found in the document.
tooltip.size: Space consumed by a file on a storage medium
tooltip.subject: Digital certificate subject refers to the entity or object to which the certificate is issued, providing information about the identity or attributes of that specific entity
tooltip.tx-hash: The unique address of a transaction in a blockchain serves as proof that the transaction has occurred.

stepper.title: Please, wait for your file to be verified...
